problem_text: Circle L has a radius of 32 centimeters. L H \perp G J, and G J = 40 centimeters. Find L K.
compact_text: Circle L has a radius of 32 centimeters. LH \perp GJ, and GJ = 40 centimeters. Find LK.
annotat_text: Circle $L$ has a radius of 32 centimeters. $\overline{L H} \perp \overline{G J},$ and $G J=40$ centimeters. Find $L K$
